short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Maps extension that shows a popup map of any address selected from a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Maps Explorer
A Chrome extension that allows users to open a Google Maps popup extension window to view location of an address or keyword highlighted on any webpage.

Features:
Extension Popup: Access to small interactive Google Maps window directly in browser extension popup window
Direct Text Search: Highlight address or keyword on any webpage and right-click or use keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Shift+Y to automatically search that text on google maps popup
Custom Configurations: Save default map configuration settings and toggle between dark and light mode themes

Installation:
Install through Google Chrome App Store

Usage:
After installing the extension, click on the Google Maps Explorer icon in your Chrome toolbar to access map
Highlight text and right-click or use shortcut Ctrl+Shift+Y to view the address in the extension window

Compatibility:
Browsers: Google Chrome (latest version)
Operating System: Windows, Linux, MacOS, ChromeOS
